    • Method Detail

      • getContributionTypes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getContributionTypes(java.lang.String userid,
                                                             java.lang.String ehrid,
                                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> programs)
        Description copied from interface: I_ContributionManager
        get the list of available contribution types for a given user, com.ethercis.ehr (e.g. patient) and within a program

        the contribution type can be seen as a collection of compositions relevant for a given act. For example, a screening visit may involve a number of examinations supported by different compositions (or forms)

        Specified by:
        getContributionTypes in interface I_ContributionManager
        Parameters:
        userid - the user to get possible contributions for
        ehrid - indirectly the patient, provides a list of already (optional)
        programs - a list of programs
        Returns:
        a list of types

      • startContribution

        public java.lang.String startContribution(java.lang.String userid,
                                          java.lang.String ehrid,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        Description copied from interface: I_ContributionManager
        start a new contribution by a contributor (user) for a given patient (ehrid), with the given type (optional)
        Specified by:
        startContribution in interface I_ContributionManager
        Parameters:
        userid - the contributor or committer
        ehrid - the target recipient
        description - descriptive literal
        Returns:
        a token id for the contribution (e.g. transaction)

      • newComposition

        public org.openehr.rm.common.archetyped.Locatable newComposition(java.lang.String contributionId,
                                                                 java.lang.String compositionName)
        Description copied from interface: I_ContributionManager
        create a new composition

        the composition created is set with the maximum number of possible fields, all fields are set to their default value

        NB: the Locatable created contains wrapped element with constraints!

        Specified by:
        newComposition in interface I_ContributionManager
        Parameters:
        contributionId - the ref id of the contribution
        compositionName - the name for composition (template id)
        Returns:
        an empty Locatable for edition
        See Also:
        ElementWrapper

      • getContributionList

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getContributionList(java.lang.String ehrId,
                                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> programs)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: I_ContributionManager
        get the list of contributions for a given com.ethercis.ehr and optionally for a given program
        Specified by:
        getContributionList in interface I_ContributionManager
        Parameters:
        ehrId - the com.ethercis.ehr to search contributions for
        programs - one or more programs to filter out the search
        Returns:
        a list of key-value pairs of string containing:
        • contribution Id: unique identifier for a contribution
        • description: a descriptive literal
        • committer: the user committing the contribution
        • system: the origin of the contribution
        • date: the date and time of contribution
        • version: the version of the contribution
        • status: the status of the contribution (original, updated)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getCompositions

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getCompositions(java.lang.String contributionId)
                                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: I_ContributionManager
        returns the list of existing compositions for an existing contribution
        Specified by:
        getCompositions in interface I_ContributionManager
        Parameters:
        contributionId - the id of a contribution
        Returns:
        a list of key-value pairs consisting of:
        • composition Id: unique identifier for a composition
        • description: a descriptive literal
        • composer: the user committing the composition
        • context: the context of the composition (facility, location, program)
        • date: the date and time of composition
        • language: the language originally used for the composition
        • version: the version of the composition
        • status: the status of the composition (original, updated)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateContribution

        public java.lang.String updateContribution(java.lang.String contributionId,
                                           java.lang.String userid)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: I_ContributionManager
        update a contribution by a contributor. The method performs the initial process to version the contribution for updating (as nothing is deleted as per openEHR requirement)
        Specified by:
        updateContribution in interface I_ContributionManager
        Parameters:
        contributionId - the id of a contribution
        userid - the contributor or committer
        Returns:
        a token id for the contribution (e.g. transaction)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
